title: 'Ayush'
author: Super Admin
description: Official Website of Department of Ayush, Government of Madhya Pradesh
cleaned_text: The key aim of the AYUSH Department is to provide health services under the AYUSH stream to the people. The AYUSH stream includes Ayurveda, Yoga and Naturopathy, Unani, Siddha, and Homoeopathy systems of healthcare and treatment. Ayush Services Health Services Educational Institutions
